cast.overview: Dory is reunited with her friends Nemo and Marlin in the search for answers about her past. What can she remember? Who are her parents? And where did she learn to speak Whale?
cast.title: Finding Dory

details.biography:
Nancy Truman is known for her work on Handy Manny (2006), Halloween (2007) and Happy Feet 2 (2011).

Nancy is a born and bred, native Angeleno. She has been a Voice Actor in Film and TV since the 1990s, and is honored to have been credited in countless blockbuster Films and TV shows along side the best Actors, Directors, and Engineers of the day. Whether in a drama, comedy or action genre, Nancy's distinctive voice always provides her unique qualities to the benefit of every project.
details.name: Nancy Truman
